traits.name: Celestial Restoration
traits.description: If the naga dies, it returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its Hit Points unless Dispel Evil and Good is cast on its remains.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The naga makes two Bite attacks. It can replace any attack with a use of Poisonous Spittle.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 10 ft. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) Piercing damage plus 22 (4d10) Poison damage.

actions.name: Poisonous Spittle
actions.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the naga can see within 60 feet. Failure: 31 (7d8) Poison damage, and the target has the Blinded condition until the start of the nagaâ€™s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The naga casts one of the following spells, requiring no Somatic or Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At Will: Thaumaturgy
1/Day Each: Clairvoyance, Cure Wounds (level 6 version), Flame Strike (level 6 version), Geas, True Seeing
